pages.text: $(3)$(l)Clypeus Shield $()is the byproduct of $(l:relic_category/magic_condenser)condensing$() $(3)$(l)Clypeus Essence$() into a $(l)Shield$(). Whenever you block an enemy using this shield, you'll add $(3)charge$() to it.$(br)When fully charged, $(3)$(l)$(k:sneak) + $(k:use)$() to knock back all nearby enemies in a radius. $(3)$(l)Clypeus Shields$() also have additional durability and lower cooldown times.
